title: Astounding Science Fiction v42n1
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 41 Number 1, September of 1948. Published by Street & Smith Publications,  Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Chesley Bonestell. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor, Robert S. Richardson and Milton A. Rothman in a book review for THE SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING OF NUCLEAR POWER edited by Clark Goodman. Includes the following works of fiction: The Catspaw, a novella by George O. Smith. Dreams Are Sacred, a novelette by Peter Phillips. The Great Air Monopoly, an Ole Doc Methuselah novelette by L. Ron Hubbard as René Lafayette The Gorgons, a shortstory by Mack Chapman Lea. Dance of a New World, a shortstory by John D. MacDonald. Inheritance (1947), a shortstory by Arthur C. Clarke.
